Posts.Content: My mam was diagnosed with cancer 3 weeks ago. She was in hospital all last week and had a partal masectomy. She came home yesterday and is very sore. Chemo is starting in April for 4 months, I am so scared and alone. Has anyone else been through this process? Some people have told me that having chemo first for that long is not very positive....please help
Posts.Title: Found out today that my mum has breast cancer
